perturbation.original_text: This Agreement is effective as of December 1st, 2015 by and between RMF Empire, Inc. DBA West Coast Customs, located at 2101 West Empire Avenue, Burbank, CA 91504 (hereinafter "WCC"), and Bosch International, LLC / XLI Technologies, Inc. located at 3753 Howard Hughes Parkway, Suite 200 Las Vegas, NV 89169 (hereinafter "XLI").
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement is effective as of December 1st, 2015 by and between RMF Empire, Inc. DBA West Coast Customs, located at 2101 West Empire Avenue, Burbank, CA 91504 (hereinafter "WCC"), and Bosch International, LLC / XLI Technologies, Inc. located at 3753 Howard Hughes Parkway, Suite 200 Las Vegas, NV 89169 (hereinafter "Bosch").
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines XLI Technologies, Inc. as "XLI". The modified text redefines XLI Technologies, Inc. as "Bosch". This creates confusion regarding which entity is being referred to throughout the contract, especially in sections outlining obligations and rights.

perturbation.original_text: WCC shall ensure that all WCC public communications shall make reference to XLI products as "Light Sheets", as further defined in Attachment A [Sponsor Benefits Schedule] attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference.
perturbation.changed_text: WCC shall ensure that all WCC public communications shall make reference to Bosch products as "Light Sheets", as further defined in Attachment A [Sponsor Benefits Schedule] attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference.
perturbation.explanation: In this context, the modified text refers to "Bosch products" instead of "XLI products", creating a contradiction since XLI Technologies, Inc. is the company marketing and distributing light sheets. This introduces uncertainty about which company's products are supposed to be promoted.

perturbation.original_text: XLI agrees to provide the following to WCC as part of this agreement: 1. Provide WCC with five million five hundred thousand (5,500,000) common stock shares of XLI Technologies, Inc. These shares will be issued within five (5) days of signing of this Agreement. The shares are fully earned and vested upon signing of this Agreement. The shares also have piggyback registration rights.
perturbation.changed_text: Bosch agrees to provide the following to WCC as part of this agreement: 1. Provide WCC with five million five hundred thousand (5,500,000) common stock shares of XLI Technologies, Inc. These shares will be issued within five (5) days of signing of this Agreement. The shares are fully earned and vested upon signing of this Agreement. The shares also have piggyback registration rights.
perturbation.explanation: The agreement now indicates that Bosch is providing WCC with XLI Technologies, Inc. stock. This makes no logical sense. It is unclear if Bosch has the authority to provide XLI's stock, creating ambiguity and rendering this provision potentially unenforceable.
